Tunable.name: SAVE_VALUE_MULTIPLE
Tunable.description: When saving the value of a continuous statistic, we force stats to the nearest multiple of this tunable for save of inventory items to increase the chance of stacking success.-Mike Duke EX: 95+ = 100, 85 to 94.9 = 90, ..., -5 to 5 = 0, ..., -95 to -100 = -100
